about_the_game:
"Most Authentic Trench Warfare Simulator" is a fun, lowpoly style, team based, PvP, first person/third person Shooter game that is based on WW1 trench warfare background.
It is also a "turn based tower defense game" which requires players from both sides to take turns to play defensive roles and offensive roles.

Players on the defensive side will need to build fortifications such as barbed wires, sandbag barriers, and static machinegun pos around their trenches and flag poles and try to use better cover and superior firepower to protect their flags.

Plays on the offensive side will need to organize an attack to capture enemy flag poles and raise their own flags within a limited time window. During the attack time window, they will be rewarded with in game currency if they made any progress on capturing enemy flags. They will also be rewarded if they got killed close enough to the enemy flag poles. The closer the get, the more rewards they will earn.

Players can later use the in game currency to build better defense so they may have a better chance to repel the next wave of enemy attack. Or they can build more long range artilleries to help them destroy more enemy fortifications thus to better prepare for their own attack.

To better represent World War I trench warfare, "Most Authentic Trench Warfare Simulator" also has a unique terrain destruction features. Players from both sides may create a no man's land with heavy artillery bombardments. We're still working on a feature to allow players to dig their own trenches and tunnels, but we can't promise that at this moment.

"Most Authentic Trench Warfare Simulator" allows Steam players to create Steam lobbies and invite their Steam friends to their own games. The game's internal voice chat system allows player to communicate with each other. The voice chat uses 3D audio source, and players can only hear each other within about 50 meters (164 ft.).
And your enemies may hear you too. So you may laydown your weapons and have a nice chat with your enemies ^ ^;
